text: lys al'amr kama zaeamuu ann aljanat tkhts btayft dun ghyrha, wa'iinama yadkhul aljnnat man akhls lilah wahdah la sharik lh, wahu mtbe llrswl muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam fi kl aqwalh waemalh. faman faeal dhlk falah thawab eamalih eind rabih fi alakhrt, wahu dukhul aljnt, wahum la yakhafun fima ystqblwnh min 'amr alakhrt, wala hum yahzanun ealaa ma fatihim min hzwz aldnya
